thread.title: Mahira Khan to join team ‘Raees’ for success celebrations
thread.title_full: Mahira Khan to join team ‘Raees’ for success celebrations

author: News Desk
title: Mahira Khan to join team ‘Raees’ for success celebrations
text:
Share Tweet Email Shah Rukh Khan and Mahira Khan in a song sequence from their movie Raees. SCREEN GRAB 
Shahrukh and Mahira Khan’s Raees has proven to be a great success as it joined the coveted 100-crore club within a week of its release, with the actress now becoming available to join the celebrations. 
Mahira who couldn’t join the promotions with SRK due to the developing pressure on the two countries following Uri attacks and ‘surgical strikes’, will now be able to join the celebrations of the super hit film. 
Mahira, Shah Rukh Khan’s Raees continues to shatter box office records A screen grab from the film, Raees 
Although the actress will be joining the success press conference, she wouldn’t be travelling to India but will interact with media by means of a video conference, Miss Kyra reported. 
SRK and other stars will also be at the conference for media interaction and responding to the fans’ questions. 
“She [Mahira] is an amazing actor, and so beautiful. Even before working on Raees , she was already an established star, it is not a new world that she has come in,” SRK had said in an earlier interview.
